name: VR Dinosaur Invasion
description:
This is a VR shooting game. A behemoth appears in your town. It is wanting to destroy your homeland as a brave guard, how can you let it not matter? Brave you need to drive the plane to manipulate the handle to attack the dinosaurs, defeat him, resist the further invasion of the destroyer, be careful not to ignore its destructive power. If you fail to kill it in the scene, it will enter the next scene Continue to attack, come on! Please defend your paradise.

Operation method:
Turn on the right handle trigger button
Flying left handle up/down key
Turn to the left handle left/right button
Accelerate the upper key on the right handle
Specify the right handle of the right handle
